startedalarm: The alarm was triggered, police alerted!
RequiredCops: Not enough police officers in the city
RequiredItems: It ain't free fool! got some cash?
ban/kick_reason_startmission_far: Too far from start mission place
TextUI:
WORKS ONLY OUTSIDE  
 [G] - Place down  
 [H] - Put in trunk
LeaveHouse: Leave house to place or store your picked up loot!
Trunk: You need to be near the trunk!
NeedBag: You need bag to go inside
NeedNight: It's too early to rob, wait until it's darker!
NeedLaptop: You need hacking laptop to disable the laser system
NeedLockpick: You need Lockpick to open safe
NeedTobeInHouse: You must be in house to do this
usedpowder: You can now see the lasers!
VehicleSpawned: Use this van to store your loot from the house.
MissionText: House is on your map, but i'm not 100% sure which one exactly!
MissionText2: Use the locator near the house for hints.
MissionText3: Get closer to the area marked on your map, then use the locator!
MissionText5: You found the house, go inside and rob it, watch out for alarms!
MissionText6: Before you go, get some tools off a guy I know, he is... shady...
notfinding: You are not currently searching for a house to rob.
